sentence: She also said she backed Rep. Liz Cheney and hoped she remained in GOP leadership.
title: GOP congresswoman shows Republicans can't have it both ways with Trump

sentence: This was her first annual retreat as conference chair; last year, failed former conference chairwoman Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) was still in chargeand she laid out how with rare exception the GOP is now unified on the issues heading into the midterms.
author: Matthew Boyle
title: Exclusive  Elise Stefanik on Biden Family Subpoenas: I Would Support Those'
